content.description: The content of the notebook entry. This should be some flavor of Markdown.

images.description: The set of images, if any, embedded in the notebook entry.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the notebook entry was created. This is used for sorting and displaying the entry's creation date.

title.description: The title of the notebook entry.

tags.description: An array of tags associated with the notebook entry. Tags can help categorize and organize entries.
